alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 06 at 4:03PM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 12 inches possible, with localized higher amounts. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Plummer, Moscow, Genesee, and Potlatch. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...The strong winds and weight of snow on tree limbs may down power lines and could cause sporadic power outages. Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
